questions.question: Can you give me a breakdown of where the chassis are that are being acquired by location?
questions.answer: 18,440 chassis with 2,827 in COCP, 232 in DCCP, etc.

primary_sources.description: Contains aggregated chassis breakdown by location - this is the only sheet that aggregates them all together

validation_notes.discrepancy_identified: Aggregation tab shows different totals than individual tabs added up
validation_notes.methodology_note: Individual tabs have location details but Region Assumptions is the aggregation source

questions.question: What are the key deal assumptions/primary levers for this transaction?
questions.answer: acquisition price per chassis, M&R rates by location, utilization rate, revenue per usage day

primary_sources.description: Contains regional deal assumptions and key drivers
Contains overall deal structure and assumptions
